tasks.task: Pruning fruit trees in the orchard.
subtasks: Examining tree branches and identifying those to remove.
Trimming branches that cross over or rub against each other.
Cutting back excessively lush branches to promote healthy growth.
Maintaining proper crotch angles on branches.

tasks.task: Using tools (razor tooth saw, pruners) to trim and cut branches.
subtasks: Cleaning pruning tools between trees to prevent disease spread.
Consider artistic freedom while pruning for desired tree shape and health.

tasks.task: Dealing with local wildlife (coyotes) during orchard work.
subtasks: Carrying a firearm for personal safety.

tasks.task: Maintaining a sense of urgency and productivity during pruning.
subtasks: Planning and scheduling regular pruning sessions for optimal growth.
